function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on computational tools for disease tracking and analysis","Impact":"Incomplete or inaccurate analysis leading to ineffective prevention and control measures","Mitigation":"Cross-validation of results with multiple tools and manual verification of findings","Technologies":"BioAider, other sequencing and analysis software","People":"Health authorities, researchers, policy makers","Owner":"Health authorities, researchers, policy makers"},{"Description":"Lack of computational solutions for social distancing enhanced optimal design of physical spaces","Impact":"Ineffective strategies for disease prevention in built environments","Mitigation":"Development of computational tools for optimal design of physical spaces, collaboration between public health experts and architects/engineers","Technologies":"Architectural and engineering design software, simulation tools","People":"Public health experts, architects, engineers","Owner":"Public health organizations, architectural firms, engineering firms"}]}
